name: Demand Forecasting - Data Scientist App
description: Detecting time series patterns and forecasting using Prophet and SARIMAX models

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Demand Forecasting Model Building App

Overview

The Demand Forecasting Model Building App enables business users to predict future sales demand for products across stores. This app leverages advanced data-driven forecasting techniques to generate predictive insights crucial for better inventory management, product pricing, and promotion strategies.

Input

  • + Perform time series analysis by selecting specific stores and SKU types to understand sales patterns.
  • + Build forecasting models using advanced algorithms like SARIMAX and Prophet.
  • + Select one or more stores and one or more SKUs for focused analysis.

Output

  • + Seasonal graphs reveal recurring patterns and longer-term fluctuations.
  • + Trend graphs show the general tendency of data over time.
  • + Yearly total sales overview.
  • + Graph comparing actual sales and forecasted sales for model training.
  • + Graph showing model evaluation metrics such as MAPE and RMSE.

Key Insights

  • + Improved Inventory Management: Optimize inventory levels, reduce carrying costs, and minimize stockouts.
  • + Enhanced Pricing Strategies: Predict demand to guide pricing for maximum profitability.
  • + Optimized Promotion Strategies: Use seasonal trends and SKU performance to plan promotions.
  • + Data-Driven Decision Making: Visualizations of actual vs. forecasted sales support confident decisions.
  • + Capture Nuanced Demand Patterns: Use SARIMAX and Prophet to model complex sales behavior.
  • + Reliable Model Performance: Multiple evaluation metrics ensure accuracy and trust.
  • + Scalable Solutions: Forecasting that grows with data and business needs.

Data Description

Field Name Description
Store The identifier or name of the store where the item was sold.
Item The identifier or name of the item sold.
Total_Quantity_Sold The total quantity of the item sold in the sales transaction.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
